alert.note: Alert for East Polk (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 02 at 9:25PM CST until January 03 at 9:00AM CST by NWS Knoxville
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 3 inches with up to 6 inches possible across the higher elevations. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. Blizzard conditions possible across the higher elevations above 4000 feet. * WHERE...In Tennessee, East Polk County. In North Carolina, Cherokee and Clay Counties. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Strong winds could cause tree damage.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
